headline: Hershey (HSY) Net Margin Falls to 11.8%, Challenging Bullish Profitability Expectations
summary: Hershey (HSY) reported a net profit margin of 11.8%, a step down from last year’s 16.2%. Over the past five years, the company’s earnings have grown by 5.9% each year, but results for the most recent year turned negative. While revenue and earnings are still forecast to grow at 3.1% and 14.3% per year respectively, both rates trail the broader US market's outlook. The results show that Hershey’s growth is steady but increasingly conservative, with profitability under pressure compared to...
